channel.title: Quick ranging issue (HP is messed up)
channel.description:
I downloaded DefaultScape, and when I attack with range, it messes up when the NPC dies. Using men as examples, they only have 7 hp. I fiddled with the range maxHit, and my hits aren't too high. However, when the NPC has <= 0 HP, my attacks are extremely high (20+) and their HP goes to 230 something. I just would like it to be so you can't hit higher than a 7 on men, and once they hit 0, their HP bar says 0/7 and then that's the end of it.
Thanks.
Note: Mage works fine.
